objects.text:
• LED Screen & Knob Selector
• 16 Wash Cycles
• 5 Temperature Settings
• Automatic Water Level Control

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution for Your Home
product_details.description:
LED screen and knob cycle selector
16 wash cycles
5 temperature settings
Child door lock
Automatic water level control

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and clean design with a soft, dual-toned background consisting of rounded abstract shapes and subtle circular elements for depth. The focal product image (id: `product_image`) of a washing machine stack is aligned on the right, partially overlapping a segmented blue-gray panel, drawing attention to the product. The headline (id: `heading`) uses bold navy typography, while the subheading (id: `subheading`) is styled in a vibrant blue, emphasizing key branding. Bullet points (id: `description`) list key features in a legible, condensed format. The price (id: `price`) is prominently displayed in bold, and a call-to-action button (id: `cta_button` and `cta`) invites user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F0F2F5
- Panel: #D1D6DE
- Accent Blue: #3B6EB3
- Text Primary: #1E2B4D
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF
- Decorative Circles: #A4B0C3 (opacity 0.2)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern washer and dryer set with a predominantly minimalist and high-contrast color palette. The primary color used is a **crisp white** (#FFFFFF), establishing a clean and sophisticated base. Deep **charcoal black** (#1A1A1A) is used prominently in the circular door frames and interior drum, offering a bold contrast that draws attention. **Steel gray** (#B0B0B0) adds a metallic accent around knobs, enhancing the premium look. Hints of **sky blue** (#B0E0E6) and **bright orange** (#FFA500) on the control dials provide functional highlights without overwhelming the aesthetic. The colors are balanced to create visual interest while maintaining clarity.
